name: Comb Ine
description:
Once upon a time there were crabs on a plane...

Made for Bevy Jam #2, but was a bit too late with the submission 🙃

Move comb-wielding player with arrow keys. Try pushing crabs away from the incoming airplanes.

Made by: Jonathan Karlsson, Hampus Linander, Lukas Lindroos, Magnus Sandén, and Eskil Varenius
